      • DEFAULT_POLL_TIME

        public static final int DEFAULT_POLL_TIME
        Number of milliseconds to sleep between attempts to poll for a component.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TEST_WAIT_TIME

        public static final int DEFAULT_TEST_WAIT_TIME
        Total number of milliseconds to wait for a GUI component, when simply testing for its existence. (i.e. for "PROHIBIT" etc)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_WAIT_TIME

        public static final int DEFAULT_WAIT_TIME
        Total number of milliseconds to wait for a GUI component to be created, before returning an error. Can be overridden by setting GuiWaitTime.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • finalShutdown

        public static void finalShutdown()
        A final shutdown that cleans up some resources the Abbot Robot leaves around. If this is not called, the application will hang for 60 seconds after it closes.
